description: DEFENCE RESEARCH AND DEVELOPMENT CANADA NEEDS:This notice is reserved for holders of supply arrangement # E60PV-19EQUI, for the purchase of Laboratory and Scientific Equipment, Parts and Accessories, Services and Supplies. The closing date published on this notice identifies how long the notice will be published. For the closing date of any solicitation under the supply arrangement, invited suppliers should refer to the solicitation documents. Suppliers that do not have a Supply Arrangement for the supply of Laboratory and Scientific Equipment, Parts and Accessories, Services and Supplies with Public Works and Government Services Canada, cannot submit a bid. Any bids received from suppliers not pre-qualified on the Supply Arrangement will not be evaluated. Defence research and development Canada as a requirement for:Item: HIGH SPEED CAMERA...,see below for details.
duration_in_months: displayed deadline is 40 days or contained value is 0
full_summary:
#### Tender Announcement
**Reference:** PW-22-01008349
**Notice Type:** Request for Proposal
**Publication Date:** September 28, 2022
**Tender Closing Date:** November 7, 2022, at 14:00:00
**Required Goods:** High Speed Camera and Accessories
**Quantity:** 1
**Duration of Contract:** From contract award to March 31, 2023
**Delivery Timeframe:** From contract award to March 31, 2023
**Defence Research and Development Canada (DRDC)** has issued a request for proposal to procure a High Speed Camera and Accessories under Supply Arrangement # E60PV-19EQUI. Only suppliers who are currently pre-qualified on this arrangement are eligible to bid.

The contract value is not specified, and interested suppliers must download the solicitation document from BuyandSell.gc.ca. The bidder with the lowest aggregate price that meets the mandatory technical criteria will be recommended for contract award.

**Mandatory Technical Criteria:**

* The bidder must hold a Supply Arrangement for Laboratory and Scientific Equipment, Parts and Accessories, Services and Supplies from Public Works and Government Services Canada.
* The bidder must meet the mandatory technical criteria.

Suppliers who are not pre-qualified on the Supply Arrangement # E60PV-19EQUI will not be evaluated. Interested suppliers can qualify at any time and submit a response following the requirements of the Request for Supply Arrangement.

**Eligible Trade Agreements:**
This procurement is subject to the following trade agreements:
* Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement (Canada-UK TCA)
* Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
* Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
* Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)
* Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
* Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
* World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
* Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
* Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA)

Service shall be provided to the Department of National Defence.
Should there be any clarification or concerns, please contact Marie-Claude Rose, Purchasing Officer at (418) 844-4000, marie-claude.rose@forces.gc.ca. 2459 route de
